UIN: Information about quality of the sidequest and rolepalaing
query: content: sidequest roleplaying quality, sentiment: neutral, mode: AND

UIN: Know what you can do while playing this game (sidequest, exploring, roleplaying, ...)
query: content: "do while playing" (sidequest || exploring || roleplaying), sentiment: neutral, mode: OR

UIN: Know whether someone liked game's nonhuman nonplayable characters
query: content: nonhuman nonplayable characters npc, sentiment: joy surprise, mode:OR

UIN: Know game's graphics problems, issues and bugs
query: content: problems issues bugs graphics, sentiment: anger sadness disgust, mode: OR

UIN: Know whether someone found the game physics unrealistic
query: content: physics unrealistic, sentiment: anger sadness disgust, mode: AND

UIN: Information about game comparison with previews chapters
query: content: previews chapters compared, sentiment: neutral, mode: AND

UIN: Know if someone found the plot interesting, involving or surprising
query: content: plot interesting involving surprising, sentiment: surprise joy, mode: OR

UIN: Information about game replayability and if it is as fun as the first run
query: content: replayability fun as first run, sentiment: joy suprise anger sadness disgust neutral, mode: AND

UIN: Some opinions about classes and races in character customization
query: content: character customization classes races, sentiment: joy surprise anger sadness disgust neutral, mode: AND

UIN: Know if there are payments or microtransactions
query: content: microtransaction payment, sentiment: neutral, mode: OR

UIN: Know whether dungeons and dragons player liked game's dice rolling system
query: content: d&d dungeons and dragons player dice rolling system, sentiment: joy surprise anger sadness disgust, mode: OR

UIN: Know if the character Astarion is a good companion
query: content: Astarion good companion, sentiment: neutral, mode: AND

UIN: Know if someone think that the game is good but it's too long
query: content: good but too long, sentiment: neutral, mode: AND

UIN: Know if this game may be liked by a woman
query: content: woman like, sentiment: neutral, mode: AND
